Discord Bot project
========

Discord Bot is a bot that you can invite to your discord server and do some cool challenges made by e04qqq.


Features
--------

- Original CTF challenges

Invitation
----------

You can invite the bot to your discord server via this [link](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=887676043194925096&permissions=403727580160&scope=bot)


Contribute
----------

Source Code: https://github.com/leohammer123/discord-bot

Running the line first to get all the modules:

    pip install -r requirements.txt


If you have any issues or ideas, please let us know.

Email:
